name: Nikhat
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May this bithday brings joy and success to your life be healthy and cheerful
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Aise hi muskurate raho, khush raho, hamari yaari hamesha bani rahe, I really miss you, hope hum jaldi milein aur baithkar khoob saari baatein karein, I miss our bond, may this birthday bring you everything and everything your heart desires, you deserve all the happiness, alwaysâ€”Happy Birthday! ðŸ’«ðŸ’–;)
